hero.title: Advanced Discord Bot
hero.subtitle: Complete Server Management
hero.description: Powerful moderation, security, and automation tools for Discord servers. Protect your community with advanced anti-raid, auto-moderation, and comprehensive logging.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your Discord server

antiRaid.title: Anti-Raid Protection
antiRaid.description: Advanced algorithms to detect and stop raids before they damage your server

autoMod.title: Auto Moderation
autoMod.description: Intelligent spam detection and automatic content filtering

logging.title: Comprehensive Logging
logging.description: Track all server activities with detailed logs and audit trails

customCommands.title: Custom Commands
customCommands.description: Create and manage custom commands for your server needs

roleManagement.title: Role Management
roleManagement.description: Automated role assignment and permission management

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language
multiLanguage.description: Support for multiple languages including Arabic, English, Spanish, and French
